medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports constant, cramping lower abdominal pain for 5 days, progressively worsening, currently rated 4 out of 10. She experienced subjective fever 4 days ago and has been having multiple small soft bowel movements daily since the pain began. She also endorses small bright red blood, consistent with prior hemorrhoids. No previous episodes of similar pain.
medical_history.family_history: Grandfather with bowel cancer; no history of inflammatory bowel disease.
